com.googlecode.cqengine.persistence

Interface Persistence<O,A extends Comparable<A>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConnectionManager, Factory<Set<O>>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DiskPersistence, OffHeapPersistence

    public interface Persistence<O,A extends Comparable<A>>
extends ConnectionManager, Factory<Set<O>>
    An interface with multiple implementations, which provide details on how a collection or indexes should be persisted off-heap (for example to off-heap memory, or to disk).
    Author:
    niall.gallagher

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void compact()
      Compacts the underlying persistence, which returns unused memory or disk space to the operating system.
      long getBytesUsed() 
      SimpleAttribute<O,A> getPrimaryKeyAttribute()

        getConnection, isApplyUpdateForIndexEnabled

      • Methods inherited from interface com.googlecode.cqengine.index.support.Factory

      • getBytesUsed

        long getBytesUsed()
        Returns:
